definition: not to be up to the task (idiom)/incompetent
surname Li
power/force/strength/ability/strenuously
(negative prefix)/not/no

victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)
surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)

sentences.english: It was evident that her physical strength could not support her strenuous task.
sentences.chinese: 繁重的工作显然使她有些力不胜任。

sentences.english: The task is beyond my strength.
sentences.chinese: 这件工作是我力不胜任的。

definition: beyond one's power (to do sth)
to work hard while accomplishing little/to toil to no avail
to be fawningly submissive (idiom)
to sit and waste a good opportunity (idiom); to lose the chance
clumsy/awkward/lacking skill
to cut the feet to fit the shoes (idiom); to force sth to fit (as to a Procrustean bed)/impractical or inelegant solution
little virtue and meager abilities (idiom); I'm a humble person and not much use at anything (Song writer Ouyang Xiu 欧阳修)
to struggle to cope (with a situation)/to be at one's wits' end
to carry out one's duties perfunctorily/to fulfill one's responsibility
hesitant and not daring to move forward (idiom)
see 心有餘而力不足|心有余而力不足[xin1 you3 yu2 er2 li4 bu4 zu2]
sweating from shame/extremely ashamed
no room to advance or to retreat (idiom); at a loss/in a hopeless situation
short-sighted/limited vision
to stand still without advancing (idiom); to hesitate and hold back
lit. not to dig a well until one is thirsty/to be unprepared and seek help at the last minute (idiom)
